name: Nicole's Balsamic Beet and Fresh Spinach Salad
author: Nicole Evans
summary: This easy-to-do salad is a tangy and healthy way to add fresh spinach and beets to your diet.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets, drained and cut into 1/4 inch slivers
¼ cup thinly sliced red onions
directions: Whisk together the balsamic vinegar, white wine vinegar, Chardonnay, and sugar in a small bowl
Place the beets and onions in a small, sealable container
Pour the vinegar mixture over the beets and onions to completely cover
Seal top; marinate in refrigerator for 4 to 5 hours
When ready to serve, divide spinach leaves between four salad plates
Top with beet mixture, and drizzle salads with a bit of the marinating liquid
